comments.content: From the linked document: "Note that when creating a server only the server ID, its links, and the admin password are guaranteed to be returned in the request. Additional attributes may be retrieved by performing subsequent GETs on the server."
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
